item.title: 7 amazing budget friendly North Indian Places to eat in Bangalore
item.author: Pranesh Srinivasan
item.description: Having lived in Bangalore for over three years now, I’ve heard a lot of people say that there just aren’t enough good, pocket friendly North Indian places to eat in Bangalore. I’ve experienced the contrary both because of where I live and my constant badgering of people for their recommendations. While I’m Madrasi (anywhere south of Mumbai, of course) and my culinary tasting abilities of the north are indeed questionable, I’ve heard nothing but good reviews of these places from others who frequent them as well.
